sentence.text: ` Oh , let them gamble ! " she chuckled .
` No , " he chuckled .
` He would , " Miss Hatherby chuckled , and they spent the next half hour discussing him .
He chuckled , ` Perhaps I can make him see the error of his ways . "
You 'll see ! " he chuckled .
` You 're right , Tom , " chuckled his aunt , ` none of 'em 's ready for buryin' yet .
` Are there no serious jobs for a man of my accomplishments to be entrusted with ? " chuckled Lawrence .
` Your concern is touching , Johnny boy , " chuckled Plummer , ` But do n't worry about me .
` Like something out of a kid 's lesson book , is n't he ? " chuckled Iris .
` Some of you thought I could n't do it , " chuckled Pipe , who then gave credit to Dickinson for the role he played in Granville Again 's timely revival .

WHEN Radovan Karadzic , leader of the Bosnian Serbs , put his worthless signature on the Vance-Owen plan in Athens on May 2nd , another Serb leader present , Dragoslav Rancic , chuckled that the plan , if it ever worked , would leave Muslims in a ` Balkan Lesotho " .
Both Davide and the plaintiff 's lawyer chuckled afterwards that he was definitely on to a good thing .
` Oh , about getting in , " said Caspar , and chuckled to himself .
Anderson chuckled goodbye and crashed on through the bushes , clink-clink-clinking in search of another rabbit hole .
` Hard day at the office , dear ? " chuckled Robinson as Porter crossed to the sink and began splashing his face with water .
` A loose tongue to match a loose brain , eh , Thomas ? " chuckled a third voice from the shadows beyond the fire .
He chuckled to himself .
Adam chuckled to himself as the four-seater Piper Arrow flew at two thousand feet across German airspace .
Wycliffe chuckled to himself at the picture he had conjured up .
Old , of course ; they represent fear of the forest ; mythologies about the birth of birds ; the relationship between earth and sky through the thick trunks of the wood he chuckled to himself .
They were both chuckling to themselves , and talking in quiet , urgent whispers .
Here , in the comfort of his own armchair and by the side of his own lake , he chuckles about the highlights of his career .
The company is still chuckling about recruiting Steve Debler , former Progress ' VP marketing and number 7 recruit in Progress , as new head of product , corporate and channels marketing .
` Cheeky , " he was chuckling drunkenly .
` I heard she got quite a reaction , did n't she ? " he wheezes and chuckles slyly , disingenuously , before getting serious .
Old Mother Jacobsen would chuckle over this : ` How much wiser must I be than Odin , I who have neither eye ! "
He chuckled , in self-approbation : But it 's always been me who left them
